titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation prohibiting the exportation of corne and graine.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton, and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Precautions against scarcity, expected due to bad weather.
"Giuen at Our Court at Greenwich, the second day of May, in the fifth yeere of Our Reigne of Great Britaine, France and Ireland."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
